channel.title: How do i change the coords of the teleport things?
channel.description: in the spellbook on devolution source, how do i change the coords so the home teleport is in a different place??

item.title: How do i change the coords of the teleport things?
item.dc:creator: @geo_dude geo dude
item.description:
@geo_dude wrote:

on client.java it says

sendQuest(“Yanille Teleport”, 13037);
sendQuest(“Teleport back home”, 13038);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13042);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13043);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13044);

wot do i change?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the coords of the teleport things?

item.title: How do i change the coords of the teleport things?
item.dc:creator: @mr_h33lz mr h33lz.
item.description:
@mr_h33lz wrote:

ye but most u look at the emote list it will say the y and x hope i helped :d[quote=“bubabaa, post:3, topic:182257”]I’m not sure about Dev source but on my server I just go in client.java and search for the teleport name e.g.

[code] if (s == “Ghorrock”){

    teleX = 3091;
    teleY = 3963;[/code]

you should see something like that - now you just edit the cords[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the coords of the teleport things?

item.title: How do i change the coords of the teleport things?
item.dc:creator: @bubabaa bubabaa
item.description:
@bubabaa wrote:

I’m not sure about Dev source but on my server I just go in client.java and search for the teleport name e.g.

[code] if (s == “Ghorrock”){

    teleX = 3091;
    teleY = 3963;[/code]

you should see something like that - now you just edit the cords

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the coords of the teleport things?

item.title: How do i change the coords of the teleport things?
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

Find the coords for where it teleports you know and search for it in your client.java.
